alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWEST FRANKLIN, NORTHEAST FAYETTE, WESTERN PICKAWAY AND SOUTHERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM... At 115 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Bloomingburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Circleville, London, Jefferson, West Jefferson, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Jeffersonville, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Commercial Point, Fox, South Solon, Midway, Harrisburg, Orient, Darbyville, Newport and Deer Creek Lake. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 81 and 85. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 70 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
